generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running through it, which is a part of the road designated for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There is a clearly defined pedestrian walkway on the left side of the road, separated from the road by a curb, which qualifies as a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings with various architectural styles are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible on the left side of the street, along with some grassy areas, which fall under the vegetation category.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk, including one person carrying a backpack.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the right side of the street, including a silver station wagon in the foreground.
- bus: A red bus is visible in the distance, stopped at a bus stop.
- train: There are tram tracks running down the middle of the road, indicating the presence of a tram system, which is a type of train.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked next to a car on the right side of the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk and street, including those supporting streetlights and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a parking sign and a warning sign for a pedestrian crossing.
- terrain: There are patches of grass and soil visible along the sidewalk and in the background, which fall under the terrain category.
